Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Source: Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fascism)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Fascism is a form of radical authoritarian nationalism that came to prominence in early 20th-century Europe, influenced by national syndicalism. Fascism originated in Italy during World War I and spread to other European countries. Fascism opposes liberalism, Marxism and anarchism and is usually placed on the far-right within the traditional left–right spectrum.
